author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-2449: add 'knob' (-Drandom.multiplier=N, defaults to 1) to tune up how much random testing is done; fix sneaky bugs (workaround java's bug in new String(int[], int, int); nasty key reuse bug in DBLRUCache) that this deeper testing uncovered
